name: save-back-to-file-from-dom
fullName: Save Back to File from DOM
title: Save Back to File from DOM
description: Save back a file URI scheme document, but save from DOM, which means it would save changes effected by JavaScript.
author: srguiwiz

preferences.name: onlyIfURIMatchesRegEx
preferences.title: Only If URI Matches Regular Expression
preferences.description: Only if URI matches regular expression. Default is ^file://.*$. Note: It cannot get around hard file URI scheme limitation.

preferences.name: showActionButton
preferences.title: Show Icon
preferences.description: Whether to show the icon in the Add-on Bar.
